lines.text: "She's some bunny isn't she? Great to see her again, It's been years, but,I never forget a face... especially, if I've sat on it. I hope you have the fun with her that I do... I love that little mole on her butt don't you? and how about that sensitive left nipple... and what mouth action! I thought jaws only moved that fast in water! You know Lou-Anne, likes to make a guy happy. More than you do for her Marco! But then, you have a problem don't you? It's called... LIMP DICK. And Lou-Anne is losing patience. Yeah me and Lou- Anne, Lou- Anne and me, we just pump away... singing that song we love... feelings!... nothing more than feelings!"
They've sent me the jokers, you must be the ace."
" Yeah, I run the bath, I catch cold, I jump to conclusions, I'm good at all those."
"The bug up your ass! It's crawlin' around there right now thinking the same thing I am."
"Wow! I've never seen a bigger asshole before in my life!"
"We've got enough to put you away, we've got your apartment, with a dead body, and I'll bet it's your knife in his back."
"Of course It's my knife you sausage! What else would the killer use to frame me?"
Any more surprises? Before I open the oven... find my Aunt Harriet?
I may be a liar, a cheat, a drunk, and a tramp... but I've got principles.
